name: This Game is Impossible (Unless you Cheat)
name_original: This Game is Impossible (Unless you Cheat)
description:
“Every non-game-breaking bug discovered during development has been refined and used as a gameplay mechanic instead, use that to your advantage and good luck”

This Game is Impossible (Unless you Cheat) or TGII for short, is a puzzle adventure game where, while playtesting a project created by an ill minded developer, you must exploit bugs in order to win and escape the game!



16+ Levels! To glitch your brain around



Fully-Voiced Dialogue! Get bugged by the narrator!
